attributes.action: Small and Medium Size Business in the UK to pay 3% tax - just like Google.
attributes.additional_details: Google, Amazon, HSBC...... the list is endless.
attributes.background: That Small and Medium Size Business in the UK only pay a maximum of 3% tax in the future, but also allow them to claim back any tax they have paid over 3% in the past 10 years.  This will bring every UK business in line with Google.

rejection.details:
A petition could call on the Government and Parliament to legislate to set the corporation tax rate for SMEs in the UK at 3 per cent and to allow SMEs to claim back any tax paid above this rate for the last 10 years.

We would consider any petition submitted along these lines.
